thread.title: David
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by David

author: David
title: David
text:
This may be a little early since all the pieces I ordered have not arrived yet,but so far everything is running smooth. Shawn , did a great job and recognized me when I returned on my second trip to the store to make my purchase.
I appreciate the guys at the back loading area with their help to make sure I was loaded and ready to travel.
Thanks, David
